name: tixflow
description: AI-powered event assistant for discovering, booking, and coordinating event tickets on Solana
author: TixFlow Team

commands.name: getEventDetails
commands.description: Get detailed information about a specific event

commands.name: purchaseTicket
commands.description: Purchase tickets for an event via cNFT

commands.name: getDirections
commands.description: Get transport directions to event venue

commands.name: checkPrices
commands.description: Check current prices for an event across platforms

tools.name: google_calendar
tools.description: Sync events to Google Calendar with direct links

tools.name: google_maps_routes
tools.description: Calculate transport routes to event venues

tools.name: crossmint_api
tools.description: Mint cNFT tickets on Solana via CrossMint

tools.name: event_scraper
tools.description: Scrape event data from various sources

tools.name: solana_wallet
tools.description: Detect and manage user wallet connections

installation.instructions: Run /skills install tixflow to add this skill to your agent
requirements: Google Calendar API key (for calendar sync)
CrossMint API key + Collection ID (for cNFT minting)
